data.title: Courtney Stadd on LinkedIn: WSBR Feb2024 Luncheon ft. Richard DalBello
data.meta_description:
I am hoping your busy calendars can find room for the following special event:

data.text: ğŸŒ Exciting News! Our event on Shaping a Sustainable Space Economy was a great start for Space Debris DAO ğŸš€ â–¶ï¸ If you missed it, don't worryâ€”the recording is now available on YouTube: https://lnkd.in/esmPa3dX ğŸš©Here's a quick recap of what we covered: ğŸŒTeam Introductions: We started with a warm welcome from our passionate team. ğŸ’¡Space Economy Insights: All about the current momentum in the space industry and what's fueling its growth. â Zero Debris Charter Panel: - Tiago Soares , Team lead at ESA Clean Space - Dr. Abir Haddad , Director at the Institute for Legal Transformation - Denis Bensoussan , Head of Space at Beazley Insurance - Moataz AbdelAzim , Director of Sales, EMEA, LeoLabs ğŸŒŸ Highlight Keynote: Ahmed EL FADHEL , president of the Tunisian Space Association - TUNSA , shared his perspective on the role of emerging space nations. We also introduced the Space Debris DAO and discussed our roadmap with opportunities for collaboration and partnerships. ğŸ¯ Our Goal: To engage with you, learn from your insights, and collectively define a vision for a sustainable space economy. We believe in the power of community and collaboration to drive meaningful change. ğŸ“£ Get Involved: Your thoughts and questions matter! Feel free to reach out, share the event, and drop your queries about the Space Debris DAO in the comments below. STAY TUNED! Our next community event is planned for mid of May (date to be announced) . ğŸ›ï¸ To stay updated, join our Linkedin community here: https://lnkd.in/eGYkRS6e ğŸ”„ Sharing is Caring: Help spread the word by sharing this post within your network! #launch #sustainablespaceeconomy #spacesustainability #spacedebris #zerodebris
